title: 365 Ways To Be Mistaken About The Market
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The latest weekly blogpost from mutual fund manager John Hussman warns of the quote ‘brutal consequences’ of staying invested in equities. There is a compelling quality to his analyses – a sort of as-day-follows-night kind of logic to them. But the former professor professes too much, and investors must firmly understand that his data do not allow us to deduce the timing of market crashes and recessions. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
